title: Từ vựng giao tiếp
description: 200 cụm từ giao tiếp hàng ngày

subtitles.text: Welcome to our English conversation lesson!
Today we will learn daily conversation phrases.
Let's start with 'How are you doing?'
This is a casual way to ask about someone's well-being.
Next phrase is 'What's up?' meaning what's happening.
Use this with friends and family only.
Another useful phrase is 'Long time no see!'
Say this when meeting someone after a long time.
Use this when meeting someone for the first time.
Finally, 'See you later!' for saying goodbye.
Practice these phrases in your daily conversations.
They will make your English sound more natural.
Keep practicing and you'll improve quickly!
Thank you for learning conversation English with us!
